channel.title: Help Choosing a Source
channel.description:
I need help picking a new source for my project. I want a clean (ish) PI server with 600+ items and I've checked out a few on the server downloads already. I don't want a PK server because that won't be the focus of my project, and I don't want an overdone custom server. Just plain, clean PI with newer items etc. I was using Project Perfection but than I trashed the whole thing once the client bugs got to me and my friends found some dupes I had no idea how to fix. So, some help finding a source please?
Edit: More like a decent base to make good, not necesarily somebody's source.

item.title: Help Choosing a Source
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:9, topic:478433”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=596656.msg4202692#msg4202692 date=1358452913]
LOl
Revision?
Dude u must learn a lot. Revision is like 317 or 667.
PI is 317 server and 317 client. You can add new items like torva and stuff to ur server.
You can do that to any server. Just download the models add the ints and some shit server sided and ur done.

So my advice is:

Do it urself and dont leech crap
[/quote]
Project Insanity is a 317 server, not a client.[/quote]
Thats exactly what i said?
PI is a server and 317 client. Oh if i read it now it does sounds pretty weird.
But i ment to say that

Read full topic

Dude u must learn a lot. Revision is like 317 or 667.

So my advice is:

Do it urself and dont leech crap
[/quote]
Project Insanity is a 317 server, not a client.[/quote]

Also try not to use a 600+ pi, try runesource, hyperion, apollo etc

item.title: Help Choosing a Source
item.dc:creator: @la_la_0wn3d la la 0wn3d
item.description:
@la_la_0wn3d wrote:

going solo means hard work… and you can get rova in revisions 317 or 600+ basically any revision? lmao and im anoob myself to coding s:

Read full topic

item.title: Help Choosing a Source
item.dc:creator: @DaGamerChild DaGamerChild
item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

@theguywhosaidtorvawasntarevison I know that, I was saying I don’t want a revision with any items higher than Torva. I understand how to do this, I’ve been working source-sided for like a year now. I was on a team of people and never laid a finger on the clients. I’m just starting to run a solo self made server here and I want to make it good.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Choosing a Source
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Start at Whitescape (or an equally clean server) and build your server up. One does not simply "download a clean server with 600+ items.

Read full topic
